entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Stavely
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stavely AAFC 7:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023
Temperature: -16.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -18.3°C
Wind: NNW 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023
